showerReviews.reviewText: Well manicured expansive park full of the best toys upon clean beauty bark. They have freshly painted basketball courts, Foursquare, hopscotch, and even place to play football legit. Just watch out for the castle bathroom, no door on stall and smells. And in the winter check it the hills for a good slope to sled in the snow!
Awesome!! Could use few more bathrooms though...
